text: Leonardo Maekawa Moreno (born August 4, 1992) is a Mexican former competitive ice dancer. With his sister, Pilar Maekawa Moreno, he competed at three Four Continents Championships from 2013 to 2015. The two were coached by Marina Zueva, Matt Willis, and Oleg Epstein. == Programs == (with Pilar Maekawa Moreno) {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Short dance !
